summary: Senior Full Stack Developer with 7+ years of expertise in architecting and developing enterprise-scale applications using React.js, Node.js, and modern JavaScript ecosystems

Demonstrated success in optimizing Single Page Application performance by 40-50% through implementation of advanced techniques including code splitting, lazy loading, component optimization, and strategic caching mechanisms

Specialized in architecting robust state management solutions using Redux and Context API, while implementing server-side rendering with Next.js to enhance application performance and SEO capabilities

responsibilities: Architected and implemented a comprehensive React component library utilized across multiple enterprise products, resulting in a 30% reduction in development time and improved UI consistency
Spearheaded frontend performance optimization initiatives, implementing code splitting, lazy loading, and React.memo() for selective rendering, which reduced initial load times by 45%

education.institution: State University of New York, New Paltz, NY

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology, Electronics and Communication Engineering
